comment: Teacher was very helpful, attentive and friendly. In order to get those bonus points talked about you must show up for class. Very informative and easy teacher if you show up and listen, might want to take notes as well.

Professor Gridley is a very nice guy who is enthusiastic about the material. Go to class and participate in the discussions, he gives extra credit points. His tests come straight from the powerpoints, even tells you if you should know something for the test. Awesome professor, would take him again if I could.

Dr. Gridley is an awesome professor. The class is fun, the tests are very straightforward and his grading is very fair. He does everything to help you get an A. I liked everything about him. Would definitely recommend him.

AWESOME professor. Super nice guy and his passion for the subject makes the class much more interesting.TAKE NOTES- his tests cover about 90% of the notes and the rest is based off the articles you're assigned to read. Never even touched the book! Easy A if you apply yourself; would most definitely recommend Gridley for anyone.

One of the few classes I looked forward to each week. Always inspired engaging class discussion. Very knowledgeable about subject matter and made every effort to answer student questions, even if he had to research and check back-in. Showed genuine enthusiasm for the subject matter. Overall, an excellent professor!
Great Professor. Didn't use my book or try hard and got a B. Easy to get an A if you show up and listen.

Lectures were interesting and easy to understand. He is always willing to answer questions & even remembers everyoneâ€™s name in the class. Tests & quizzes are easy as class averages was a mid B. He gives extra credit for attendance & for participation. Just show up to class, study notes, and learn how to spell names he points out & boom easy A.

Great professor. Gives very clear lectures, sticks to his schedule and is willing to answer any and all things presented. Tests are fairly easy, just put a little effort into this course and you'll be fine. If you take good notes you don't really need the book.

This class was great. He is an exceptional teacher and has been teaching this class for a while. His tests are medium difficulty, and as long as you put in a little effort you will do well. I would take this professor's classes as often as you can.

I took Gridley for environmental law. This class was especially interesting. If you don't have a passion for the environment you will after this class. There is a massive paper due at the end of the course, make sure you have the topic after the second class meeting.
GREAT TEACHER :)

He is an outstanding professor with a contagious passion for political science.  Loved the class and aced it easily.  Highly recommended professor.  Just take notes straight from his PP, participate in class discussion, and you should get a great grade.

Great professor, lectures are straightforward, and interactive. BUT don't be late, class starts promptly at the designated time, and if you miss more than a class or are late to more than two, you miss out on some bonus points!

Very polite and exciting teacher. He becomes ecstatic with participation and is very perky, especially in the morning. He only required one presentation, although we had to research the topic to answer on-spot questions. He also is very serious on his tests. Just study up and this class will be very enjoyable and memorable.
Professional, easy to understand and work with. I would recommend this professor.

Wonderful professor. I must have emailed him 30 times outside of class and he always replied IMMEDIATELY and helped me with anything I needed. Passionate for his subject and makes even the people that aren't excited about the class learn and enjoy learning. Take anything this guy teaches.
This class is epic easy. There is a book, but i have no idea what it was called. There were never any questions from it. Easy A, and you still learn a lot about the world.

Coolest teacher here.  Extremely clear...he announces his exams, test, and quizzes from day one, so there are no suprises.  He has an incredible passion for the subject matter as well, which is contagious.  Would take him again, w/out hesitation.
AWESOME TEACHER! Crystal Clear and EXTREMELY Helpful. Easy class if you're not a complete idiot.
Amazing teacher!  Loves his craft and passionate about political stuff!  Fun class, and never boring....

EASY A. Take him. Very Helpful and nice. The bonus points talked about below is true. Do not buy the book. Waste of money. I never read it; I only studied his notes and read his articles that he assigned, and I should get an A.
HE IS A GREAT TEACHER!!! NOTES FROM POWERPOINT, EASY TO TALK TO, VERY HELPFUL!!!! IF YOU STUDY FOR THE TEST YOU CAN PASS IT. HE GIVE BOUNS POINTS FOR TALKING IN CLASS AND ON THE TEST!!!

AWESOME PROFESSOR!!! Very laid back. His tests come straight from his lecture notes.  He is strict on punctuality so be there on time. If you miss 1.5 days of class or less per test you get 5 extra credit points on test! He makes the class very intersting! If you are taking Poly Sci take this guy, you will not be sorry!

Awesome Professor! Extremely nice. For me the subject is hard, but if you are good at this subject, it will be an easy A. His lectures and TESTS are based on PPT. Make sure to attend classes to get the notes down. Attendance matters. Book is NOT required, just know the notes

Reads off powerpoints. Book is used for a few questions on the test that he didn't have time to cover in class. Copy down the pp, and study 90% from that. The rest will be from internet articles. If you miss a class, you can ask him to see his pp from the day you missed. The tests are rather difficult so don't take them lightly. If you study, B.
